title: ANALYSIS: Solar Is a Booming Renewable and Impending Eco-Disaster
description: Workers install solar panels at a photovoltaic power station in Hami in northwestern China's Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region Monday Aug. 22, 2011. (Chinatopix via AP)

title: Meta Lowers Minimum Age of Quest Headsets in Bid to Lure Children Into VR
description: A Meta worker uses a Meta Quest VR headset at the Meta showroom in Brussels, Belgium, on Dec. 07, 2022. (Kenzo Tribouillard/AFP via Getty Images)
